name: Rat Race`
description:
If you had one shot, one opportunity, to capture all the cheese you've ever wanted. Would  you do it? Or just let it go? You have 10 minutes to gather all of the parts to get to the cheese moon. 

This project was created for the Lunar New Year Jam! A friend and I worked on this project. We used various free assets and textures from the Unreal Marketplace for a large portion of the level.

Controls : 

WASD to move

Spacebar to jump

E to pick up or let go of objects

Mouse to move the camera and objects

M to view the map, esc to exit the map

Esc to pause
